title: Crispy Rosemary Chicken and Fries Recipe
description: This is a one pan meal that's in the oven in 15 minutes. Rosemary, garlic, and oregano create a mouth watering aroma and the potatoes are crispy like french fries. Kids just love this!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Meat and Poultry Chicken Baked and Roasted Oven Fried Crispy Rosemary Chicken and Fries 4.4 (1,360) 958 Reviews 123 Photos This one-pan crispy rosemary chicken and fries is ready in 15 minutes. Rosemary, garlic, and oregano create a mouth-watering aroma. If using dried herbs in place of fresh, use 1/3 the amount. The potatoes are crispy like French fries; just serve with ketchup. Kids love this! Submitted by SANDY WITEK Updated on December 3, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 123 123 123 123 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 1 hr Total Time: 1 hr 15 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 8 chicken thighs 6 small red potatoes, quartered ½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary 1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh oregano 1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder salt and ground black pepper to taste Directions Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Toss chicken and potatoes with oil in a large bowl; transfer to a large baking dish or cookie sheet with sides. Sprinkle with rosemary, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, for 1 hour; baste during last 15 minutes for extra crispness. I Made It Print 1,455 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Crispy Rosemary Chicken and Fries 01 of 123 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 123 Photo by  KindFish3073 10/11/2023 Great and simple 03 of 123 Photo by  RedClove4132 07/14/2023 Easy, delicious. I added onion and carrots. 04 of 123 Photo by  William Quinn 03/10/2022 Great easy recipe! I added 2 minced cloves of garlic on the chicken before baking. 05 of 123 Photo by  Sonya A 09/14/2021 06 of 123 Photo by  pgomez 06/08/2021 07 of 123 Photo by  sweeters 03/08/2021 I have made it many times but just now posted a photo. I use drumsticks at my son’s request and I like thighs. The skin is wonderfully crispy and tasty! This recipe is perfectly delicious! ?? 08 of 123 Photo by  Brina 07/05/2020 The chicken was very tender and tasty. Potatoes flavor was amazing!! 09 of 123 Photo by  Brina 07/05/2020 The chicken was very tender and tasty. name: SANDY WITEK
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).;Toss chicken and potatoes with oil in a large bowl; transfer to a large baking dish or cookie sheet with sides. Sprinkle with rosemary, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.;Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, for 1 hour; baste during last 15 minutes for extra crispness.
